item.title: Kubernetes Hazelcast Distributed Caching
item.description: The sample code can be found on GitHub. 1 Let’s get ready first our Spring Boot application with the following dependencies. <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-cache</artifactId> </dependency> And also let’s take the hazelcast-all from com.hazelcast that include the k8s dependencies. The version 4.x.x will also support yaml configuration of hazelcast. <dependency> <groupId>com.hazelcast</groupId> <artifactId>hazelcast-all</artifactId> <version>4.0.3</version> </dependency> Let’s implement a real foo service with a super Jack Norris API for the moment. The API will take a string on /api/[key] eg.
